Question: Guangdong Changjincheng Tech Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangdong Changjincheng Tech Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Offers one-stop service for motors, rubber, and hardware products
- Serves multiple industries including home appliances, power tools, personal care, consumer robots, and medical equipment
- Integrated manufacturing system provides fast small-batch production, short lead time, high flexibility, and low cost
- Products include massage fiscia gun BLDC motor, mixer universal AC motor, air pump universal AC motor, paper shredder PMDC motor, air purifier BLDC motor, professional massage gun BLDC motor, and more
- Products are protected by over 100 patents and qualified by UL/CSA/CE/CCC
- Vertical integration supply system for hardware, plastic, and silicon rubber component independent production
- Offers engineering R&D capabilities including electromagnetic coupling simulation, CAD design, CAE simulation design, and mold flow analysis
Summary_cn:
广东长金诚科技有限公司。

CES 2024产品亮点

- 提供电机、橡胶和五金产品的一站式服务
- 为家用电器、电动工具、个人护理、消费者机器人和医疗设备等多个行业提供服务
- 集成制造系统可提供快速小批量生产、短交货时间、高灵活性和低成本
- 产品包括按摩筋膜枪BLDC电机，搅拌机通用交流电机，空气泵通用交流电机，纸碎机PMDC电机，空气净化器BLDC电机，专业按摩枪BLDC电机等等
- 产品拥有超过100项专利，并通过UL / CSA / CE / CCC认证
- 垂直整合供应系统，实现了五金、塑料和硅橡胶组件的独立生产
- 提供工程研发能力，包括电磁耦合仿真、CAD设计、CAE仿真设计和模流分析
